channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【eBPF Foundation Announces Community & Advocacy Fellowship Program】eBPF 基金会宣布社区和倡导奖学金计划
item.description: 【The fellowship is a six-month grant for individuals who want to dedicate their time to growing and educating the eBPF community】该奖学金是为那些想要将时间投入到发展和教育 eBPF 社区的个人提供的为期六个月的资助

item.title: 【Testing eBPF Program Compatibility Across Kernels with LVH and GitHub Actions】使用 LVH 和 GitHub Actions 测试 eBPF 程序跨内核的兼容性
item.description: 【GitHub Actions Meets Little VM Helper and eBPF】GitHub Actions 遇见 Little VM Helper 和 eBPF

item.title: 【Breaking Boundaries: Implementing the Enigma Machine in eBPF】打破界限：在 eBPF 中实现 Enigma 机
item.description: 【André Martins celebrates Alan Turing 113th posthumous birthday by implementing the Enigma machine in eBPF】安德烈·马丁斯 (André Martins) 通过在 eBPF 中实施 Enigma 机器来庆祝艾伦·图灵 (Alan Turing) 逝世 113 岁生日

item.title: 【Why Does My eBPF Program Work on One Kernel but Fail on Another?】为什么我的 eBPF 程序在一个内核上运行但在另一个内核上失败？
item.description: 【Learn how to make eBPF programs portable across different Linux kernels using BPF CO-RE and BTF, and discover techniques for supporting systems without built-in BTF by embedding external BTF data.】了解如何使用 BPF CO-RE 和 BTF 使 eBPF 程序可在不同的 Linux 内核之间移植，并发现通过嵌入外部 BTF 数据来支持没有内置 BTF 的系统的技术。

item.title: 【eBPF Announces Support for Tolkien Ring】eBPF 宣布支持 Tolkien Ring
item.description: 【eBPF revives Tolkien Ring, proving even ancient networks can be rebuilt better】eBPF 复兴了托尔金环，证明即使是古老的网络也可以更好地重建

item.title: 【What If CI/CD Pipelines Had Built-in Security and Observability with eBPF?】如果 CI/CD 管道通过 eBPF 具有内置安全性和可观察性会怎样？
item.description: 【Learn how eBPF can add real-time security and observability to CI/CD pipelines like GitHub Actions, helping detect exploits and optimize workflows execution time.】了解 eBPF 如何为 GitHub Actions 等 CI/CD 管道添加实时安全性和可观察性，帮助检测漏洞并优化工作流程执行时间。

item.title: 【Case Study: Polar Signals Uses eBPF to Monitor Internal Cross-Zone Network Traffic on Kubernetes, Reducing These Operating Costs by 50%】案例研究：Polar Signals 使用 eBPF 监控 Kubernetes 上的内部跨区域网络流量，将运营成本降低 50%
item.description: 【Polar Signals developed kubezonnet, an open source project designed to monitor and measure cross-zone network traffic in Kubernetes clusters. The solution leverages eBPF to trace network packets and aggregate traffic data.】Polar Signals 开发了 kubezonnet，这是一个开源项目，旨在监控和测量 Kubernetes 集群中的跨区域网络流量。该解决方案利用 eBPF 来跟踪网络数据包并聚合流量数据。

item.title: 【Tracepoints, Kprobes, or Fprobes: Which One Should You Choose?】Tracepoints、Kprobes 或 Fprobes：您应该选择哪一个？
item.description: 【Tracing programs like kprobes, fprobes, and tracepoints are very popular, but their overlapping functionality can make choosing the right one confusing.】kprobes、fprobes 和tracepoint 等跟踪程序非常流行，但它们的重叠功能可能会让选择正确的程序变得混乱。

item.title: 【eBPF in 2025 - Bigger Than the CrowdStrike Outage】2025 年的 eBPF - 比 CrowdStrike 中断更大
item.description: 【 In 2025 eBPF adoption will expand rapidly and other predictions】2025 年 eBPF 的采用将迅速扩大以及其他预测

item.title: 【P99Conf: How eBPF Could Make Faster Database Systems】P99Conf：eBPF 如何打造更快的数据库系统
item.description: 【Learn about BPF-DB, an in-memory key-value data store that can be planted within the OS kernel itself via eBPF, thereby routing around the restrictions and limitations of an OS’s user space, or the space in memory where a program is typically run】了解 BPF-DB，这是一种内存中键值数据存储，可以通过 eBPF 植入操作系统内核本身，从而绕过操作系统用户空间或通常运行程序的内存空间的约束和限制
